name: whispers-of-the-heart
description: Whispers of the Heart - A modern blog platform with React frontend and NestJS backend
author: Your Name

scripts.dev:local: pnpm env:dev && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d && pnpm dev
scripts.dev:local:db: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d postgres redis minio pgadmin
scripts.deploy: pnpm build:prod && pnpm prod:build && pnpm prod:up
scripts.setup: pnpm install && pnpm db:generate && pnpm packages:build
scripts.reset: pnpm clean && pnpm install && pnpm db:generate && pnpm packages:build
scripts.ports: echo '🚀 项目端口信息:' && echo '  本地开发:' && echo '    API: http://localhost:7777/api/v1' && echo '    Web: http://localhost:8888' && echo '    Admin: http://localhost:9999' && echo '    PostgreSQL: localhost:5432' && echo '    Redis: localhost:6379' && echo '    MinIO: http://localhost:9001' && echo '    pgAdmin: http://localhost:5050' && echo '' && echo '  生产环境:' && echo '    Web: https://whispers.example.com' && echo '    API: https://api.whispers.example.com' && echo '    Admin: https://admin.whispers.example.com'
scripts.health: echo '🔍 检查服务状态...' && curl -s http://localhost:7777/api/v1/health || echo 'API 未运行' && curl -s http://localhost:8888 -o /dev/null && echo 'Web 运行正常' || echo 'Web 未运行' && curl -s http://localhost:9999 -o /dev/null && echo 'Admin 运行正常' || echo 'Admin 未运行'
